question.title: What is the primary cause of external hemorrhoidal thrombosis?
question.description: A question about the differential diagnosis of external hemorrhoidal thrombosis

option_a.title: Inflammatory bowel disease
option_a.description: A condition that can cause chronic inflammation in the rectum and anus

option_b.title: Hemorrhoidal vein obstruction
option_b.description: A condition where the veins in the hemorrhoid become blocked

option_c.title: Trauma to the anal sphincter
option_c.description: A physical injury to the muscles around the anus

option_d.title: Inadequate bowel preparation
option_d.description: A common cause of hemorrhoidal thrombosis

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct option
